Governance & ESG 
Being a successful global business means more than 
developing innovative solutions for our customers and 
delivering strong financial returns for our shareholders. 
At KLA we believe that to be truly successful, a strong 
commitment to corporate responsibility and consistent, 
fair business practices is essential. 
Put simply, governance is about ensuring we run our 
business responsibly and ethically—through specific 
policies, rules, and processes for corporate accountability, 
transparency, fairness and responsibility. We put a high 
priority on governance at KLA because it enables us to 
create results that are meaningful to all stakeholders, from 
our customers to our investors to the employees who 
drive our business.At KLA, governance is closely aligned with our efforts to Advance Humanity. Many of the 
practices and policies we have established are designed to meet regulatory standards 
while others are intended to achieve specific corporate goals or ESG targets. 
KLA is governed by a Board of Directors, established in accordance with applicable laws 
and our Corporate Governance Standards. 
The Board has three standing committees, each of which has specific oversight 
responsibilities for various aspects of KLA's business. Each committee is governed by a 
charter that defines its areas of responsibility.
Management is responsible for updating the Board and its committees on KLA operations, 
employees, customers and suppliers.What Does Governance Entail?How Does Governance
